name: postcss-uncomment
description: Uncomment one-line comments into CSS statements or rules.

scripts.test: echo 'Running tests...'; npm run test:ec && npm run test:js && npm run test:tape

engines.yarn: YARN NO LONGER USED - use npm instead.
